channel.description: Describe package groups Understand application streams and modules Software repositories and how to access them Review module streams and module profiles Perform software management operations using dnf List, install, update, and delete individual packages, package groups, and modules Show package information, determine provider, and search metadata Exhibit package group and module information Install module from alternative stream RHCSA Objectives: 44.Install and update software packages from Red Hat Network, a remote repository, or from the local file system 45.
